import React, { Fragment } from "react"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Header from '../components/Header'; import Leftnav from '../components/Leftnav'; import Appfooter from '../components/Appfooter'; import Popupchat from '../components/Popupchat'; const Settings = (props) => { const Logout = () => event => { props.cookies.remove('current-token') window.location.href = "/"; } return (
